TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WindowClosedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class WindowClosedEventArgs Inherits AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: Contiene información sobre el evento que se provoca cuando se cierra una ventana.

span.span: Contains information about the event that is raised when a window is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para suscribirse a eventos de ventana cerrada, llame a , especificando en el `eventId` parámetro y proporcionando un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] controlador de eventos que toma un parámetro.To subscribe to window-closed events, call , specifying in the `eventId` parameter and supplying an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handler that takes a parameter. Cuando la aplicación recibe un evento de ventana cerrada, el `sender` parámetro del controlador de eventos no se puede usar para obtener información acerca de la ventana que se ha cerrado, porque el correspondiente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento ya no es válido.When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid. ## Examples Para obtener código de ejemplo, vea .For example code, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32[] runtimeId) cil managed

param.name: runtimeId
param.span: Identificador en tiempo de ejecución de la ventana que se ha cerrado.

span.span: The runtime identifier of the window that has closed.

summary.span: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32[] GetRuntimeId() cil managed

summary.span: Recupera el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] en tiempo de ejecución de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] asociado a este evento.

span.span: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] associated with this event.

returns.span: Identificador de tiempo de ejecución del elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] de la ventana en la que se generó el evento.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime ID of the window on which the event was raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando la aplicación recibe un evento de ventana cerrada, el `sender` parámetro del controlador de eventos no se puede usar para obtener información acerca de la ventana que se ha cerrado, porque el correspondiente [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento ya no es válido.When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid. Use para que coincida con la ventana con un identificador conocido.Use to match the window with a known identifier. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, el controlador para el evento de cierre de ventana determina si el identificador en tiempo de ejecución de la ventana cerrada está en una lista de los identificadores de ventanas abiertas.In the following example, the handler for the window-closed event ascertains whether the runtime ID of the closed window is in a list of the IDs of open windows. Si el identificador en tiempo de ejecución está presente, se quita de la lista.If the runtime ID is present, it is removed from the list. [!code-csharp[UIAFocusTracker_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/CSharp/FocusTracker.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAFocusTracker_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/VisualBasic/FocusTracker.vb#101)]
